item.title: 俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争已于周六进入第二年，俄罗斯再次发动进攻，袭击了前线城市：
item.description:
Russia's war in Ukraine hit the two-year mark on Saturday, and Russia is again on the attack, striking cities along the frontline.

item.title: 一项新的研究不仅证实了定期进行体育锻炼可以延长人的寿命和降低死亡风险的已知研究，而且还发现，在运动量较低的情况下，女性从运动中获得的益处比男性更大。
item.description:
A new study not only confirms known research that regular physical activity can prolong life and lower a person's risk of dying, it also finds that women experience greater benefits from exercise than men do, at lower amounts of exercise. https://t.co/lFQr0nZ8jT

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 在俄克拉荷马州奥瓦索市的学校里，16 岁的非二元制学生奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）在与其他几名学生发生肢体冲突一天后死亡。
item.description:

item.title: 研究人员表示，最近几周美国西南部地区破纪录的降雨量仍然不足以彻底消除这个臭名昭著的干旱地区的特大干旱状况。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 一项关于鲸鱼如何在水下歌唱的发现，让科学家们了解到航运活动产生的噪声污染如何改变鲸鱼的交流能力。
item.description:

item.title: "我不得不离开，因为我必须生存，必须重新开始生活。离开家园、祖国和亲人是一个非常艰难的决定"。战争进入第三年，乌克兰难民前途未卜。
item.description:
"I had to leave because I had to survive and to give a new life. It was a very hard decision to [leave] your home, your country, your relatives."

Uncertain future for Ukrainian refugees as war enters third year. https://t.co/OVpexMBycY

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 一名 7 岁女孩的不幸身亡让人们开始关注海滩安全，特别是在沙滩上玩耍时的安全。以下是专家们为如何保证孩子和大人在沙滩上的安全而提供的建议：
item.description:
The tragic death of a 7-year-old girl has put a spotlight on beach safety, specifically when it comes to playing in the sand.

Here are tips from experts for how to keep kids and adults alike safe at the beach: https://t.co/ncNhaRAwkD

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 最新发布的一份报告显示，纽约市一半以上的居民，包括四分之一的儿童，生活在贫困或低收入之中。
item.description:
More than half of New York City residents, including a quarter of all children, live in poverty or are low-income, according to a newly released report. https://t.co/400hOz4WOZ

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 根据美国疾病预防控制中心（CDC）的数据，从 2019-2021 学年到 2022-2023 学年，全国麻腮风疫苗覆盖率下降了 2%，这意味着全国约有 25 万名幼儿园儿童面临感染麻疹的风险。
item.description:
National MMR coverage has dropped 2% from the 2019-2021 school year to the 2022-2023 school year, which means approximately 250,000 kindergartners are at risk for measles infection around the country, according to the CDC. https://t.co/EHwZWqBlZD

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 现年 99 岁的前总统吉米-卡特（Jimmy Carter）是第一位在世时获得白宫官方圣诞饰品殊荣的美国总统。

item.title: 专家们说，拜登政府的最新一轮制裁虽然值得欢迎，但不太可能产生重大影响，因为俄罗斯仍在继续颠覆西方最坏的预期后果。

item.title: 法庭文件显示，科罗拉多大学一名学生被指控在寝室内枪杀了包括室友在内的两人，据称他在几周前曾告诉室友，如果再让他倒垃圾，他就 "杀了他"。
item.description:
A University of Colorado student who is accused of gunning down two people in his dorm room, including his roommate, had allegedly told his roommate weeks prior that he'd "kill him" if he was asked to take out the trash again, according to court documents. https://t.co/buWwvfCQlE pic.twitter.com/ePAJzqFPdS

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024
